meanings.definition: The quality or state of being curious.
meanings.sent1: Her curiousnesses about the world led her to explore new places.
meanings.sent2: The children's curiousnesses about the bug sparked their interest in science.
meanings.sent3: His curiousnesses about the mysterious noise made him investigate the attic.
meanings.sent4: The curiousnesses of the detective helped solve the case quickly.
meanings.sent5: The cat's curiousnesses about the moving object made it pounce playfully.

meanings.sent1: The book contained many curiousnesses that kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent2: The museum exhibit showcased various curiousnesses from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The curiousnesses of the students in the science class made the teacher smile.
meanings.sent4: The curiousnesses in the room created an atmosphere of excitement and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The curiousnesses of the crowd grew as the magician performed his tricks.
